title: Tata Motors expects EV sales to rev up again in H2
description: Tata Motors expected a recovery in EV sales in the latter half of the year, aided by festive season sales, new models, and clearer government subsidies for fleet vehicles. Sales had recently dipped due to a general market slowdown and the discontinuation of the FAME II scheme. The company launched the Curvv.ev to entice petrol SUV buyers with competitive pricing.
